header.title: Administration Panel
header.subtitle: Customize the appearance of your business website

body.title: Welcome to your Control Center
body.subtitle: As an administrator, you have full access to customize the layout and appearance of your business website to your specific brand needs.

first.title: 100% Customizable Template
first.text: Completely customize our professional template to suit your exact needs. Fine-tune every element to your brand vision to create a unique web presence that stands out from your competition.

second.title: Content Structure
second.text: Configure your website sections to strategically highlight your products, services, and unique values.

first.title: Language Selection
first.text: Offer a multilingual experience on your website. Select from a variety of languages ​​to meet the needs of your global audience and improve accessibility.

second.title: Responsive Design
second.text: Your website automatically adapts to any screen size, ensuring an optimal experience on mobile devices, tablets, and desktops with state-of-the-art responsive technology.

password.title: Password
password.noLowerCase: Must include at least one lowercase letter
password.noUpperCase: Must include at least one uppercase letter
password.noNumber: Must include at least one number
password.noSpecialChar: Must include at least one special character ([/@$|><()[]{}_,.`~!%^*#-+=?&])
